aiExplanation: Product revenue increased $25M (5.1%) QoQ, driven primarily by the launch of the Enterprise Platform v3.0 in October which contributed $18M in new license revenue. Additional $7M from existing customer upsells in the financial services vertical.
comments: Consistent with product launch forecast. No concerns.

aiExplanation: Services revenue grew $12M (6.1%) QoQ. Key contributors include: (1) $6.5M from three large implementation projects for Meta, Netflix, and Salesforce that reached milestone-based recognition; (2) $3.2M increase in managed services renewals; (3) $2.3M from consulting engagements related to platform v3.0 upgrades.
comments: In line with project milestones. Verified against SOWs.

aiExplanation: R&D expense increased $5M (3.7%) QoQ, within the 5% materiality threshold. Increase attributed to 25 new engineering hires in October and increased cloud infrastructure costs for the development environment.

S&M expense increased $7M (6.5%) QoQ. Primary drivers: (1) $3.5M in Q4 marketing campaigns including annual customer conference; (2) $2.1M in higher sales commissions tied to strong Q4 bookings; (3) $1.4M increase in digital advertising spend for Enterprise Platform v3.0 launch.
AR increased $10M (3.2%) QoQ, consistent with revenue growth of 5.4%. DSO remained stable at 37 days (vs 38 days in Q3). No concentration risk concerns - top 10 customers represent 42% of AR balance.

Long-term investments increased $60M (42.9%) QoQ due to: (1) $45M strategic investment in Series C of FinanceAI Corp, a fintech startup; (2) $15M additional treasury allocation to corporate bond portfolio per updated investment policy approved by the Board in November.
comments: Board-approved investment. FinanceAI strategic partnership documented in Board minutes 11/15.

aiExplanation: Deferred revenue increased $8M (4.4%) QoQ, reflecting strong Q4 bookings with multi-year contracts. New annual subscriptions added $23M, offset by $15M in Q4 revenue recognition from prior period deferrals.

Cash increased $30M (7.1%) QoQ. Operating cash flow was $95M, offset by: (1) $45M FinanceAI investment; (2) $12.5M debt principal payment; (3) $5M intercompany transfer to Meeru Europe; (4) $2.5M capex. Strong collections in December contributed to higher-than-expected year-end cash position.
comments: Cash flow waterfall reconciled. No issues.

aiExplanation: Goodwill increased $60M (14.3%) YoY due to the acquisition of DataSync Technologies in Q1 2024 for $85M, of which $60M was allocated to goodwill. Annual impairment testing completed with no impairment identified.
comments: Impairment test documentation reviewed. Fair value exceeds carrying value by 35%.

aiExplanation: COGS Product increased $7M (3.7%) QoQ, below the revenue growth rate of 5.1%, resulting in improved gross margin. Infrastructure scaling efficiencies and renegotiated hosting contracts contributed to margin expansion.
AP increased $7M (3.9%) QoQ, consistent with increased COGS and operating expenses. DPO remained stable at 54 days. No unusual vendor concentrations or aging issues identified.

G&A increased $7M (12.1%) YoY. Key drivers: (1) $2.5M higher legal and compliance costs related to international expansion; (2) $2M increase in D&O insurance premiums; (3) $1.5M bad debt expense adjustment; (4) $1M in ERP system upgrade costs.

Interest income increased $4M (50%) YoY driven by: (1) Higher average cash balances throughout 2024; (2) Increased allocation to higher-yielding money market funds; (3) Rising interest rate environment providing better returns on short-term investments.
comments: Verified against bank statements and investment reports.

aiExplanation: Accrued compensation increased $7M (8.0%) QoQ. Primary factors: (1) Annual bonus accrual of $4.5M based on exceeding Q4 targets; (2) $1.5M in accrued vacation for year-end; (3) $1M higher headcount-related accruals (net 40 new hires in Q4).
Retained earnings increased $70M (9.3%) QoQ, equal to Q4 net income of $90M less $20M in dividends declared. This is consistent with the expected accumulation from profitable operations.
comments: Reconciled to net income and dividend declarations. Clean.
